level.heading: Report to the Mayor, Council, and the public.
level.text: The Commission shall report on an annual basis to the Mayor and Council on the work of the Commission and areas of the Homeland Security Program in need of improvement and shall make the annual report available to the public.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 17-353 validated a previously made technical correction.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-262
level.text: For Law 16-262, see notes following ยง 7-2271.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-353
level.text: For Law 17-353, see notes following ยง 7-161.
